      • getUserPermissionsByUserAndName

        public Collection<UserPermission> getUserPermissionsByUserAndName(Integer userId,
                                                                  String permissionName,
                                                                  Integer firstResult,
                                                                  Integer maxResults)
        Gets the user permissions by user and name.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user identifier.
        permissionName - The permission name (or name expression).
        firstResult - The first result that should be considered by the query.
        maxResults - The maximum numbers of results to be considered by the query.
        Returns:
        The user permissions by name.
